[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@liquity/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [userAddress](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md)

## BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams.userAddress property

Address whose Vault, Stability Deposit, MP Stake and balances will be read by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly userAddress?: string;
```

## Remarks

For example [getVault(address?)](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.getvault.md) will return the Vault owned by `userAddress` when the `address` parameter is omitted.

Should be omitted when connecting through a [Signer](./lib-ethers.bitcoinssigner.md)<!-- -->. Instead `userAddress` will be automatically determined from the `Signer`<!-- -->.
